wmndsBusAndTramTimetableProps.name: routeName
wmndsBusAndTramTimetableProps.description: Required. The name of the bus or tram route.

wmndsBusAndTramTimetableProps.name: lastUpdated
wmndsBusAndTramTimetableProps.description: Required. Date the timetable was last updated.

wmndsBusAndTramTimetableProps.name: departureTimes
wmndsBusAndTramTimetableProps.description: Array of objects for departure times. See departureTimes below.

arrayOptions.name: departureTime
arrayOptions.description: The start time for the route departure.

arrayOptions.name: route
arrayOptions.description: Array of objects for route stops. Accepted keys are: stopDepartureTime and stopName.
